svg.text: Jan 03: US Assassinated Solemani
Jan 08: Iran bombs a US base in retaliation
Jan 08: Iran accidentally shoots down Ukraine International Airlines Flight 752
Jan 09: House passes War powers resolution to limit president's power
Jan 14: Iowa primary debate
Jan 14: 46 million hectares burning in Australia
Jan 16: Impeachment Trial Begins
Jan 21: First Covid case in US
Jan 23: Last death in the 2019-20 Australia Fire
Jan 29: WH Covid Task force established
Jan 31: Trump bans travel with China
Jan 31: Senate votes for no witnesses in trial
Feb 03: Iowa Caucus, utter debacle with app, win for Buttigieg
Feb 05: Impeachment Trial Over
Feb 07: Almost all fires extinguished by rain in Australia
Feb 11: New Hampshire Primary, win for Bernie
Feb 17: Americans Evacuated from Diamond Princess Cruise due to Covid
Feb 22: Nevada Caucus, win for Bernie
Feb 23: Ahmaud Arbery Murdered in Georgia, no arrests made
Feb 23: Hindu anti-muslim riots that kill 53 people begin in Delhi
Feb 27: Fear of Covid causes Dow to drop 4.4%
Feb 29: US/Taliban sign Doha Agreement
Feb 29: First US Covid Death (Seattle)
Mar 01: Buttigieg Drops out
Mar 02: Klobuchar Drops out
Mar 03: Super Tuesday, Biden Wins
Mar 04: Newsom Declares a state of emergency over Covid
Mar 05: Warren Drops out
Mar 05: Senate approves $8.3 billion in covid funding
Mar 06: First Covid Death outside the West Coast in Florida
Mar 09: Black Monday
Mar 10: US Hits 1000 cases
Mar 11: US Bans Travel with Europe
Mar 12: Black Thursday, Dow falls 11%
Mar 13: US Declares a State of Emergency over Covid
Mar 16: Breonna Taylor is killed by the police in Louisville during a no-knock raid
Mar 16: Dow falls by 12.93%, biggest crash ever
Mar 16: Bay Area Counties issue Shelter in Place
Mar 16: First Phase I Covid Vaccine Trial
Mar 17: Covid in all 50 states
Mar 18: Trump authorizes Defense Production Act
Mar 18: Dow drops 6%
Mar 18: Gabbard Drops Out
Mar 19: CA Issues shelter in place
Mar 19: Unemployment Numbers Released Showing 33% increase in claims over prior week
Mar 20: NY isses shelter in place
Mar 22: US uses military to help CA and NY with Covid
Mar 24: Dow rises 11%
Mar 25: US Passes 1000 Covid deaths
Mar 25: US Passes CARES Act (Covid stimulus)
Mar 26: US Now has the largest number of cases in the world
Mar 26: Space Force launches its first satellite
Mar 31: US Passes 3000 Covid deaths, 75% of the country is under shelter in place
Apr 01: US Builds up troops near Venezuela
Apr 03: CDC Recommends Masks
Apr 06: US Passes 10000 Covid deaths
Apr 07: Wisconsin Primaries, Scandal as there is no vote by mail
Apr 08: Bernie Sanders drops out
Apr 11: US Becomes #1 in Covid Deaths
Apr 11: Every state has a disaster declaration for the first time in history
Apr 14: Trump announces he will suspend US funding of WHO
Apr 15: NY requires masks in public
Apr 17: Texas and Florida start reopening
Apr 20: Oil prices fall below $0
Apr 21: Bipartisan Senate Report confirms Russian interference in 2016 election
Apr 22: Trump bans certain green cards for 2mo
Apr 24: Small business bailout signed
Apr 27: 3 UFO videos seen
Apr 27: US passes 1 million Covid cases
Apr 30: Armed protesters in Michigan capitol protesting the lockdown
May 02: Kansas Primary, Biden wins
May 03: Murder Hornets
May 06: Ahmaud Arbery Tape released and goes viral, causing outrage about the lack of arrests
May 07: First charges in murder of Ahmaud Arbery case filed
May 07: Case dropped against flynn
May 08: Unemployment reaches 14.7%
May 16: Explosion in LA downtown
May 19: US passes 1.5 million cases and 90000 deaths
May 19: Dam collapse in Michigan
May 19: Primaries in Kentucky and Georgia
May 21: Third person charged in Ahmaud Arbery case
May 26: Twitter fact checks a Trump tweet
May 26: George Floyd is murdered by police in Minneapolis
May 27: Trump threatens to shut down twitter
May 27: 100,000 Covid deaths in US
May 27: Protests for George Floyd in Minneapolis
May 28: Protesters in Minnesota burn a police precinct
May 28: State of emergency declared in Minnesota
May 29: Twitter blocks a tweet by Trump saying "when the looting starts, the shooting starts"
May 29: Chauvin charged with murder in death of George Floyd
May 30: Curfews declared in LA, Philadelphia, and Atlanta
May 31: Trump describes Antifa as a terrorist organization
Jun 01: Autopsy reports that George Floyd's death was the fault of the police
Jun 01: Trump has police fire tear gas into a peaceful protest so that he can have a photo op in front of a church
Jun 02: Blackout Tuesday
Jun 02: FBI concludes no antifa involvement in at least the DC BLM protests
Jun 03: Charges filed against the other 3 officers involved in the George Floyd murder
Jun 04: Evidence that Ahmaud Arbery was hit by a truck comes out
Jun 04: New fencing put up around White House
Jun 05: DC Mayor designates a 2 block section of 16th street NW as Black Lives Matter Plaza
Jun 07: Veto-Proof Majority of Minneapolis City Council Says they plan to disband the police
Jun 08: Capitol Hill Autonomous Zone declared in Seattle
Jun 08: Golden Gate Bridge starts making a weird sound
Jun 10: Minneapolis Withdraws from negociations with union
Jun 10: US Passes 2 million COVID cases
Jun 11: Date this was last updated
